main event: A UFO sighting near Joshua Tree, California, on 5th January 1953, involving the observation of a circular flying craft emitting a faint blue glow, hovering for several minutes, and then rapidly disappearing.
interesting points: The observer reported a saucer-shaped flying object approximately 30 feet in diameter and emitting a faint blue glow, which hovered for several minutes before accelerating and disappearing.
The observer saw the object when a ground C.S.A. NAFLL located airplane caused them to look up. The object was in sight for only a few seconds.

The observer estimated the size of the object to be approximately 40 to 50 feet in diameter and described it as a dark silhouette against the sky with a grayish color and even turbulence or disturbance of the surrounding air.
The UFO report includes details such as sketches of the observed UFO, estimates of the object's speed and distance, as well as the weather conditions and other witness details.
The report also mentions the Giant Rock Interplanetary Airport and an upcoming interplanetary spacecraft convention that was to be held in California.
sighted object: circular flying craft emitting a faint blue glow
